TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlLanguageConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides type conversion for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This converter exists primarily so that the existing `xml:lang` settings in an XML file do not interfere with the parsing of attributes that use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> as their underlying type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext typeDescriptorContext, System.Globalization.CultureInfo cultureInfo, object source);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext typeDescriptorContext, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo cultureInfo, object source) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ConvertFrom (typeDescriptorContext As ITypeDescriptorContext, cultureInfo As CultureInfo, source As Object) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertFrom(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ typeDescriptorContext, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ cultureInfo, System::Object ^ source);
override this.ConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj -> obj

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
The to use as the current culture.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified string value to the type supported by this converter.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the converted value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `source` value must be a string, otherwise an exception is thrown. If the conversion is successful, the return value is a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>. See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> for additional exception information.

override this.ConvertTo : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj * Type -> obj

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
The to use as the current culture.
The object to convert. This is expected to be type .
A type that represents the type you want to convert to.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified to the specified type.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the converted value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For `destinationType` <xref:System.String>, this method returns the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> value of the provided <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>. For `destinationType` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> this method returns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> instance that is useful for serialization. Other `destinationType` inputs throw exceptions.
